    Admin Configuration

    Streams can be managed below through the links to the Restreamer server. New streams cannot be created here, for that you must contact the admin

    If you see the (Error: Your stream wasn’t accessible. …. Operation not permitted) the system is functioning. Send some stream there and it will work

    You must ensure that the stream is started and is listening in the stream config link.

    See the setup guide for more instruction.

    Custom Feed

    Use this feed for custom mixed events using some software like OBS to add content.

    James Custom livestreams

    View live streams mixed with other sources.

    Watch configure stream

    Setup

    Each stream uses a seprate port to communicate with the video signal stream. Use the configuration details from below to connect the camera system to the server to stream.

    Livestream Stream Config Link Player Link Live Image Link stream link
    AW-Main /ccawest-main/ /Main/player.html /Main/images/live.jpg rtmp://128.199.9.133:11935/live/external.stream?token=j5GZw5Jh4tdhQDz4BZ7xH2xm3K
    BW-Main /ccbwest-main/ /Main/player.html /Main/images/live.jpg rtmp://128.199.9.133:11938/live/external.stream?token=sAFB3T6NK9Gc2NN
    BE-Main /ccbeast-main/ /Main/player.html /Main/images/live.jpg rtmp://128.199.9.133:11941/live/external.stream?token=5g4jKC7MH7m9P5t
    CE-Main /ccceast-main/ /Main/player.html /Main/images/live.jpg rtmp://128.199.9.133:11944/live/external.stream?token=35E9MNzq63D4DzS
    Custom /jamesFeed/ /jamesFeed/player.html https:///images/live.jpg rtmp://128.199.9.133:11947/live/external.stream?token=xeeGKh7KS2mtR9H
